name: Senior Data Engineer (Python, AWS)
description:
We are looking for a senior specialist to build the system to store and manage data used in algorithm development. This system will be a center to keeping, versioning and managing access to data used for development and testing our new model of intraoral scanner. You will be responsible for building the system according to design and requirements, communication with stakeholders – architect, algorithm development, data labeling and quality assurance. You will be working in team of algorithm developers with technical support from DevOps and IT.

Responsibilities:

  • Perform full cycle for software development, including design, prototyping, development, debugging and support of corporate software applications using Python
  • Research & implementation of algorithm problem solutions
  • Participate in development of architecture of program components
  • Accurate and precise code documenting
  • Provide fair estimations for work efforts needed to solve task
  • Provide flexibility in tasks solving: be ready to jump on another project to be on same page with business priorities

Requirements:

  • 3+ years hands-on experience with data storage, permission management and compute workloads on AWS
  • Experience with at least one tool for provisioning infrastructure on AWS (e.g. Terraform, AWS CloudFormation)
  • Experience with Docker containers
  • 4+ years hands-on Python experience
  • Familiarity with data collection and preparation
  • Hands-on experience in other programming languages like C++, C#, bash or any other scripting languages
  • English from intermediate

We offer:

  • Employment according to the Labor law
  • Competitive salary and annual bonuses
  • Professional development and career growth, trainings, conferences, English and Spain classes
  • Voluntary Medical Insurance for all employees and their children (with dental treatment)
  • Lunch allowance
  • 31 vacation days, paid days-off.
  • Gym in the office
  • Corporate events for employees and their children
  • Flexible working hours (usually 11:00 до 19:45)
